title: Chandigarh Kare Aashiqui
writer: Supratik Sen, Tushar Paranjape, Abhishek Kapoor
short_cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Vaani Kapoor, Yograj Singh, Anjan Srivastav, Kanwaljeet Singh, Girish Dhamija, Satwant Kaur, Abhishek Bajaj, Gourav Sharma, Goutam Sharma
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Vaani Kapoor, Yograj Singh, Anjan Srivastav, Kanwaljeet Singh, Girish Dhamija, Satwant Kaur, Abhishek Bajaj, Gourav Sharma, Goutam Sharma
genre: Social Issue Dramas, LGBTQ Movies, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Romantic Movies
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: Sparks fly when bodybuilder Manu meets Zumba instructor Maanvi, but Manu struggles with ingrained bias upon learning Maanvi's deeply personal story.
